thread.title: Here's How The Stars Of Moonlight Reacted To Learning They'd Won The Best Picture Oscar Award
thread.title_full: Here's How The Stars Of Moonlight Reacted To Learning They'd Won The Best Picture Oscar Award

author: Timothy Burke on Screengrabber, shared by Timothy Burke to Deadspin
title: Here's How The Stars Of Moonlight Reacted To Learning They'd Won The Best Picture Oscar Award
text: The backstage Oscars feed shows the moment hosts—including ESPN’s Adnan Virk—and the stars of Moonlight realized the epic screwup that led to La La Land being initially announced as Best Picture winner . There are some fantastic shots of the shocked crowd here, too. Advertisement
